Overcrowded, choked with pollution and literally sinking,...
...Jakarta is famous for all the wrong reasons.
So what's a president to do?
This is Soeharto Hills in East Kalimantan, one of the proposed sites for a fresh start.
So the idea is to move the center of government to the new capital in Kalimantan.
These rolling hills dotted with illegal plantations...
...may soon be home to one and a half million civil servants and their families,...
...government, military headquarters and international embassies relocated...
...with early construction set to start within two years.
